explains: n. 应征士兵，被征召者

sentences.en: One young conscript rose with a message of thanks, his voice choked with emotion.
sentences.cn: 一年轻应征入伍者站起以哽咽之声动情致谢。

sentences.en: A conscript in a shabby uniform saluted the car.
sentences.cn: 一个穿着破旧制服的士兵向汽车敬礼。

sentences.en: Your body accords with conscript requirement completely.
sentences.cn: 你的身体完全符合征兵要求。
